page.title: 05Yetholm Tourist Sites
page.content: Kirkfield Caravan Park is small and pleasantly situated in Town Yetholm. There is a modern toilet block, with razor points, hot and cold water to the wash basins, and showers. There are 14 static caravans and room for 18 tourers and 12 tents. It is open from April 1st to October 31st. The Youth Hostel is situated in Kirk Yetholm, behind the open village green on the way to Blunty's Mill. There is accomodation for thirty six with the hostel open from March to October. A warden is in attendance during opening hours. During the summer months the hostel is very busy with over five hundred people staying during August 1984.
